Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_status_code') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderShipping ADD shipping_status_code NVARCHAR(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_office_name') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderShipping ADD shipping_office_name NVARCHAR(15) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_handy_time') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderShipping ADD shipping_handy_time NVARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_current_status') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderShipping ADD shipping_current_status NVARCHAR(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''; END GO IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderShipping' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'shipping_status_detail') BEGIN ALTER TABLE w2_OrderShipping ADD shipping_status_detail NVARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''; END GO
